data.description:
Fit Immersion transforms your cardio sessions in an immersive and interactive experience. Our goal is to simulate an outdoor ride from your stationary bike. You can discover touristic and cyclist tracks mostly filmed in 360Â° in different countries or made in 3D. To make it more realistic the app synchronizes movement speed with pedaling frequency and even difficulty if you have a compatible smart trainer (BLE FTMS). 
Tested some tracks and convinced? Then grab some credits and download tracks of your choice. 
Note: The app iscapable to communicate with Bluetooth cadence sensors, smart bikes and pedals in official version since v1.4 (needs Oculus v37 update).

changelog.change_log: New track available, corrected potential frame drop in preview and potential waste of space during track download
New track in China, corrected potential glitch on track download and speed sync
Improved track download functionality
Adding cyclist avatar on updated old tracks.
New italian track available, corrected FR radio not playing, added download button on main screen
New track available in improved quality format.
Corrected message and difficulty not changing over time
New track available. Fix notify on track downloaded and UI frozen for users with old format data.
New track available. Training selection page fixed.
New track available, small visual fixes
New track available, new functionality : live web radio, player bugs correction
Added alternative sensor connect method for device not updated to Android 12
Corrected crash appeared with update to Android 12

New track available. 
Now daily use is limited for non-pro users.
Improved cadence from head estimation, changed tracks order (new ones first)
Now log file is created when an exception occurs
New track available!
Corrected player crash or not starting when device back from sleep mode, fix training not starting when canceled connecting to sensor
New track available, hiding controller when riding, correct player not starting immediately on training launch
Corrected playback not starting regression of previous version
